alert.note: Alert for Lincoln; Turner (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 30 at 12:23AM MDT until May 30 at 1:00AM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Lincoln County in southeastern South Dakota... Southeastern Turner County in southeastern South Dakota... * Until 200 AM CDT. * At 122 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hurley, or near Parker, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Lennox and Chancellor around 130 AM CDT. Tea around 145 AM CDT. Sioux Falls around 200 AM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for southeastern South Dakota. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for southeastern South Dakota.
